name: Demon
summary: Attacks from Demons have a chance on hit to burn all of an enemy's mana and deal that much as true damage.
tier_info: (2)  Demons have a 40% Chance on Hit to Mana Burn
(4)  Demons have a 60% Chance on Hit to Mana Burn
(6)  Demons have a 80% Chance on Hit to Mana Burn

name: Dragon
summary: Dragons are immune to Magic damage.
tier_info: (2)  All Dragons are Immune to Magic Damage

name: Exile
summary: If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield.
tier_info: (1)  Gain a shield equal to 100% Maximum Health.

name: Glacial
summary: Attacks from Glacial have a chance to stun for 2 seconds.
tier_info: (2)  Glacials have a 20% Chance to Stun
(4)  Glacials have a 30% Chance to Stun
(6)  Glacials have a 45% Chance to Stun

name: Robot
summary: Robots start combat at full mana.
tier_info: (1)  Robots start combat with Full Mana.

name: Imperial
tier_info: (2)  1 Random Imperial deals double damage
(4)  All Imperials deal double damage

name: Noble
summary: Noble grants +100 Armor and 35 health per attack.
tier_info: (3)  1 Random ally +100 Armor and 35 health per attack.
(6)  All allies +100 Armor and 35 health per attack.

name: Ninja
summary: Ninjas gain a percentage of Attack Damage
tier_info: (1)  With exactly 1 Ninja, it gains +40% Attack Damage.
(4)  With exactly 4 Ninjas, they gain +60% Attack Damage.

name: Pirate
summary: Earn additional gold after combat against another player by a chest left behind at the end of the round.
tier_info: (3)  Randomly earn up to 1 - 4 additional gold every turn

name: Phantom
summary: Curse a random enemy at the start of combat.
tier_info: (2)  Random selected cursed enemy has their HP set to 100.

name: Wild
summary: Attacks generate stacks of Fury (stacks up to 5 times) with every attack. Each stack of Fury gives 7% Attack Speed.
tier_info: (2)  Wild allies only gain 7% Attack Speed (stacks up to 5 times)
(4)  All allies gain 7% Attack Speed (stacks up to 5 times)

name: Void
summary: All basic attacks ignore enemy's Armor.
tier_info: (3)  All Units Ignore 50% Armor

name: Yordle
summary: Attacks against ally Yordles have a chance to miss.
tier_info: (3)  25% chance to miss an attack against a Yordle
(6)  50% chance to miss an attack against a Yordle
